content_analysis.posting_frequency: Part of 250-300 pieces per week across all platforms (80+ pieces weekly initially)
content_formats: Static image posts with text overlays
content_analysis.style_notes: Fast-paced editing with jump cuts. Talking head style with direct eye contact. Heavy use of captions and subtitles. Catchy music overlays. Authentic, unfiltered direct-to-camera approach. Blends business insights with personal life.
content_analysis.caption_style: Direct, concise, business-focused. Clear calls-to-action. Personal experiences over generic advice. Platform-specific messaging.

content_strategy.core_approach: Content repurposing - creates one long-form piece (YouTube/podcast) then slices into 30+ bite-sized assets
content_strategy.workflow: Uses Twitter to test content ideas, assesses engagement, then repurposes top-performing content into short/long-form video
content_strategy.volume_philosophy: Only way to get better is volume. Volume times time equals mastery.
content_strategy.testing_ground: Twitter serves as idea testing platform before expanding to other channels

video_characteristics.editing_style: Concise delivery, high-energy presentation, visually dynamic editing
key_elements: Talking head style for direct communication
Minimal setup for quick content creation
video_characteristics.influence: Terms like 'Alex Hormozi style', 'Alex Hormozi captions', and 'Alex Hormozi editing' dominate search trends across platforms

recent_strategy_shift_2024_2025.from_edutainment_to_education: Shifted from entertaining content to pure business education
recent_strategy_shift_2024_2025.audience_targeting: Changed from wide audience to ideal customer (business owners)
recent_strategy_shift_2024_2025.topic_narrowing: Moved from wide topics (fitness, relationships) to narrow business-specific topics
recent_strategy_shift_2024_2025.metrics_focus: Prioritized revenue per thousand impressions (RPM) over raw views

platform_tier: S tier - investing more resources due to high traffic and conversion rates
